lead_paragraph: Two former officials say that MSA Security tolerated racial harassment of one of the few African-American employees in the corporate office.

headline.main: Suit Claims Racial Harassment at Security Firm With New York City Contracts
headline.print_headline: Suit Claims Racial Harassment at Security Firm With City Contracts

abstract: MSA Security, contractor that has made tens of millions of dollars guarding Lower Manhattan since September 11, is at center of controversy; its former chief executive and another former company official have charged in lawsuit that company tolerated racial harassment of one of its few African-American employees in corporate office.
snippet: Two former officials say that MSA Security tolerated racial harassment of one of the few African-American employees in the corporate office.
